certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate
Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android <7.0

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
metadata.cwe: CWE-532 Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File

metadata.description: App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
App creates temp file. Sensitive information should never be written into a temp file.
Insecure WebView Implementation. Execution of user controlled code in WebView is a critical Security Hole.

CWE-327 Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
metadata.description: MD5 is a weak hash known to have hash collisions.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does encrypt some transmitted data with HTTPS/TLS/SSH between itself and another trusted IT product.

FCS_COP.1.1(2).choice: The application perform cryptographic hashing services not in accordance with FCS_COP.1.1(2) and uses the cryptographic algorithm RC2/RC4/MD4/MD5.

strings: "sharetext" : "Hi there, Give this app a try."

"tag" : "Cryptocurrency Market UK lists over 1000 Cryptocurrency Prices in GBP, including the latest Bitcoin Price BTC, Litecoin Price LTC, Ethereum Price ETH, Ripple Price XRP, and Monero Price XMR. All Cryptocurrency data is automatically updated 24/7."
"cnfExit" : "Are you sure you want to exit?"

playstore_details.title: Cryptocurrency - Cryptocurrency Prices - Bitcoin
playstore_details.description:
Cryptocurrency Market UK provides coinmarketcap information and key metrics for over 6000 Cryptocurrency prices including the latest Bitcoin Price BTC, Litecoin Price LTC, Ethereum Price ETH, Ripple XRP, and Monero XMR. Information offered includes market cap, key metrics, charts, and exchange prices for cryptocurrencies in GBP, USD & Euro.

Cryptocurrency Market UK key features:
- Cryptocurrency Prices
- Cryptocurrency Market
- Bitcoin BTC 
- Bitcoin Price App 
- Bitcoin (BTC) Price Tracker 
- Cryptocurrency Portal
- Data for 6000+ cryptocurrencies
- All data is updated realtime 24/7
- Exchange Data
- Cryptocurrency news feed 
- Currency Converter
- Crypto Mining Equipment

Track the latest altcoin and bitcoin price with full charts. All Cryptocurrency data is automatically updated realtime 24/7. All prices are displayed in GBP, USD, Euro, and many other Fiat currencies. Historical data is available for the most popular cryptocurrencies; this shown in easy to read charts with time ranges of between 1 day and all time. Top currencies listed including Bitcoin BTC, Litecoin LTC, Ethereum ETH, Ripple XRP, and Monero XMR. 

Our definition of cryptocurrency or crypto is "a fully decentralised digital currency secured by cryptography". Bitcoin was the first digital currency and came into existence in 2009, there are now over 6000 Altcoins; we list most of these on this site. The cryptocurrency prices observed on exchanges are based solely on supply and demand.

This coinmarketcap does not provide investment advice, nor do we guarantee the accuracy of currency information on this site. Always seek professional independent advice, and verify prices from several trusted sources before dealing in cryptocurrencies.

The following is a selection of the main cryptocurrencies that can be tracked with charts, this list is not exhaustive:

    BTC (Bitcoin)
    ETH (Ethereum)
    XRP (Ripple)
    ETC (Ethereum Classic)
    GNT (Golem)

Thanks for your interest in our CoinMarketCap app, feedback always welcomed.
